diagram.chart:
flowchart TD
    A[Start] --> B{"len(nums1) > len(nums2)?"}
    B -- Yes --> C[Swap nums1, nums2]
    B -- No --> D[Binary Search on nums1]
    D --> E{Found Partition?}
    E -- No --> F[Adjust low/high]
    E -- Yes --> G[Calculate Median]
diagram.title: Median Search Logic
diagram.explanation: Ensures we always binary search the smaller array.
